display_long_description:
Take control of the ultimate stealth operative and save the world in this single player & co-op FPS! Experience unparalleled stealth action with Espire 2, a full-fledged VR & MR first person shooter! 

# Graphical Updates for Meta Quest 3
[media]
Our latest update includes visual enhancements for Meta Quest 3, Meta Quest 2 & Meta Quest Pro. 

# Pure Stealth Gameplay
[media]
Handle encounters with a variety of unique gadgets or neutralize targets with a wide array of realistic weapons. Use your headset’s built-in microphone to distract, hold up and interrogate the enemy.

# Select your Frame
[media]
Control multiple Espire robot frames, each with their own special abilities and strategic benefits for you to discover.

# Single player and Co-op campaigns
[media]
Take on OPHIS a lone wolf or team up with a friend for a co-op adventure in **two unique campaigns**.

# Globe-Trotting Narrative Experience
[media]
Intel from an anonymous whistleblower reveals the techno-terrorist cell OPHIS’ plot for global domination. With the entire world hanging in the balance, it’s up to Espire Operative Poe and their Espire frames to dismantle OPHIS from the inside.

# Full Freedom of Movement without Motion Sickness
[media]
Our unique Control Theater comfort system displays in your peripheral vision during artificial locomotion, **greatly minimizing** the onset of VR Sickness. You can adjust or **completely disable** this feature.
